command: echo 'T1601 verify: hashing entire rootfs partition'; dd if=/dev/mtdblock5 bs=1M 2>/dev/null | sha256sum | tee /tmp/T1601_rootfs.sha256
explanation: Generates a SHA256 hash of the root filesystem partition to validate or document the current system image before or after malicious alteration.
rationale_steps: Read the rootfs partition directly from flash to avoid filesystem artifacts.
Compute a cryptographic hash to check integrity or track changes.
Store the hash to support stealthy version control of malicious patches.
